summary: This bill, the PRECISE Act of 2025, primarily focuses on promoting precision agriculture. It amends existing legislation (Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act, Food Security Act of 1985) to incentivize the adoption of precision agriculture practices and technologies.  It defines precision agriculture and its related technologies, offers financial assistance to rural entities for implementing them, updates environmental quality incentives, and provides for supplemental payments within the Conservation Stewardship Program. The bill also emphasizes the use of third-party providers for technical assistance in soil health planning.
